scaledmarkets.dabl.exec

Interface Repo

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileRepo, SnapshotRepo
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalRepo, RemoteRepo

    public interface Repo
    A container for a set of files, such as a repository project, or a directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsFile(java.lang.String filepath)
      Return true if this Repo contains the specified file.
      long countAllFiles()
      Return the total number of non-directory files in all directories of this Repo.
      java.util.Date getDateOfMostRecentChange(PatternSets patternSets)
      Examine all of the files in the pattern set, and return most recent date of change among all of the included files.
      void getFiles(PatternSets patternSets, java.io.File dir)
      Copy the specified files from the repository into the specified directory.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles()
      List the files that exist at the top level in this repo.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles(java.lang.String dirpath)
      List the files that exist in the specified directory in this Repo.
      void listFilesRecursively(java.util.List<java.lang.String> files)
      List all of the files in this repo - including those in subdirectories.
      void listFilesRecursively(java.util.List<java.lang.String> files, java.lang.String dirpath)
      List the files that exist in the specified directory and all child directories in this repo.
      void putFiles(java.io.File dir, PatternSets patternSets)
      Store ("push") the specified files from 'dir' to the specified repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getFiles

        void getFiles(PatternSets patternSets,
              java.io.File dir)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Copy the specified files from the repository into the specified directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • putFiles

        void putFiles(java.io.File dir,
              PatternSets patternSets)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Store ("push") the specified files from 'dir' to the specified repository. 'dir' is treated as the filesystem root, for the purpose of pattern set matching.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • listFiles

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles(java.lang.String dirpath)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        List the files that exist in the specified directory in this Repo. The directory may be a path of directories. The file path separator is a forward slash, and the root ("/") is the top of the Repo. The file names returned are relative to dirpath.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • listFilesRecursively

        void listFilesRecursively(java.util.List<java.lang.String> files,
                          java.lang.String dirpath)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        List the files that exist in the specified directory and all child directories in this repo. The file paths (relative to dirpath) are returned in the list argument.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • listFiles

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        List the files that exist at the top level in this repo.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • listFilesRecursively

        void listFilesRecursively(java.util.List<java.lang.String> files)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        List all of the files in this repo - including those in subdirectories. The file paths (relative to dirpath) are returned in the list argument.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • containsFile

        boolean containsFile(java.lang.String filepath)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Return true if this Repo contains the specified file. The file is fully specified by its path within the Repo. The file may be a regular file or a directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • countAllFiles

        long countAllFiles()
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Return the total number of non-directory files in all directories of this Repo.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getDateOfMostRecentChange

        java.util.Date getDateOfMostRecentChange(PatternSets patternSets)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Examine all of the files in the pattern set, and return most recent date of change among all of the included files.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
